key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny in China, particularly affecting JD Technology and fintech operations
Competitive pressures from rivals like Alibaba and Pinduoduo
Labor practices and ethical concerns in logistics operations
Internal audit issues and governance concerns
controversies: Delayed $2 billion Hong Kong IPO due to lack of regulatory approval
Rebranding layoffs as 'graduations' leading to public outcry
Data breach affecting 10 million customers at JD Sports
Suspicious practices identified during internal audit at Dada Nexus
environmental_issues: Green logistics programs using electric vehicles and renewable energy
social_issues: Poor working conditions and allegations of worker exploitation in logistics network
governance_issues: Internal audit issues at Dada Nexus raising questions about financial integrity and oversight

sources.title: JD Sports data breach affects 10 million customers - Cyber Security Hub
sources.snippet: British sports clothing retailer JD Sports has reported a data breach that has affected more than 10 million customers. The retailer said on January 30 that the data breach occurred after a malicious party gained unauthorized access to a system containing customer data relating to orders placed between November 2018 and October 2020.
